properties.name: email.host.port
properties.description: Port number for Email host provider.

properties.name: email.username
properties.description: Username of the email host provider is your provided email address.

properties.name: email.password
properties.description: Password of the Email. But Google has enforced app specific password in recent times, so please generate app specific password in the Google Account.

properties.name: email.transport.protocol
properties.description: Network Protocol for the Email host provider.

properties.name: email.smtp.auth
properties.description: Enable authentication for the Email SMTP.

properties.name: email.smtp.starttls.enable
properties.description: Enable STMP Start TLS for the Email host provider.

properties.name: email.debug
properties.description: Enable debug for the Email service.

properties.name: email.send.sms.to.email
properties.description: Allow send SMS content to email. For debug purpose only.

properties.name: email.send.sms.to.email.address
properties.description: Email address to be used for see SMS content. For debug purpose only.
